rules.description: Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Change left_command to left_control. (Post escape if pressed alone)
Change left_option to left_option. (Post _ if pressed alone)

manipulators.description: Change right_command to command+control+option+shift.(Post ( if pressed alone)
Change caps_lock to command+control+option+shift.(Post caps_lock if pressed alone)
Finder C-y paste by move(similiar of C-x, C-v on window)
